Advert.title: Advert
Advert.description: Represents an advertisement image for the home page carousel.

linkUrl.description: Optional URL to navigate to when the ad is clicked.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of when the advert was added.

Card.title: Card
Card.description: Represents a scratch card for top-up.

networkId.description: The ID of the network this card belongs to.

categoryId.description: The ID of the category/value of this card.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of when the card was added.

usedAt.description: The timestamp of when the card was used.

usedBy.description: The UID of the user who used the card.

Customer.title: Customer
Customer.description: Represents a customer with their account and balance information.

id.description: Unique identifier for the customer, matches Firebase Auth UID.

requiresPasswordChange.description: If true, the user must change their password on next login.

Operation.title: Operation
Operation.description: Represents a financial transaction or operation for a customer.

amount.description: The amount of the transaction. Positive for income, negative for outcome.

description.description: A short description of the operation, e.g., 'Transfer to John Doe' or 'Aden Net - 1GB Package'.

cardNumber.description: The scratch card number if the operation is a purchase.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a user notification for a financial transaction or system message.

body.description: The main content of the notification.

amount.description: The transaction amount related to the notification, if applicable.

read.description: Indicates if the notification has been read by the user.

cardNumber.description: The scratch card number if the notification is for a purchase.

primaryColor.description: The HSL value for the primary theme color.

NavItem.title: Navigation Item
NavItem.description: Represents a configurable navigation item for UI menus.

label.description: The display text for the navigation item.

href.description: The URL path for the navigation link.

icon.description: The name of the lucide-react icon to display.

location.description: Where the item appears in the UI.

order.description: The display order for the item.

Stores individual navigation items for dynamic menus in the app. This is a subcollection under 'settings/navigation'.

firestore.reasoning:
The database structure is designed to store customer information, including their account details, contact number, and balance, and to allow the application to update their balance. To ensure security and proper data segregation, each customer's data is stored under a collection named 'customers'. This structure offers a clear separation of customer records, making it easy to manage and scale customer-related operations. A new collection 'settings' is added to store global application settings like the theme color and font, allowing an admin to update it for all users in real-time.

**Authorization Independence:**  Since all customer data is self-contained within the `customers` collection, there is no reliance on data from other collections for authorization. Security rules can be applied directly to the `customers` collection based on the user's authentication status. The `settings` collection has its own rules allowing admin writes and public reads.

**QAPs Support:** The segregation strategy ensures that listing customers is secure, as the rules applied to `/customers/{customerId}` govern access to each individual customer's document. There is no mixing of different access needs within the same collection.
